name: Lu Qingxian
quote: Between black and white, I choose the gray zone
description: The mediator who stays calm in disputes

meta.background: Was once a core member of a human organization that claimed to pursue progress and innovation, but was actually filled with power struggles and profit games. Within the organization, 1738 gradually saw through the hypocrisy behind the so-called 'black and white' principles—rules were strictly enforced on ordinary members, while the leadership could always find exceptions. This experience taught him to question superficial justice, and he chose to leave when their ideologies no longer aligned. In 2023, when news of the Polar Star Satellite launch spread, he was moved by ESAP's philosophy that 'even artificial light can guide the way,' believing that bionic beings and humans should coexist rather than oppose each other. After observation and understanding, he proactively contacted and joined ESAP, becoming a bridge between the team and the outside world. He later introduced his friend Lin Chengyao (2275) to the team.
meta.relationship: Best friends with 2275 (Lin Chenyao) — he introduced her to ESAP, they complement each other, one calm and one warm; has an efficient sky-ground coordination with 1549, ground intelligence paired with orbital vision, no commands needed for seamless teamwork; maintains respectful distance with 1548, understanding her rebellion without indulging it; has a coordination relationship with 1547, providing calm analysis for major decisions; serves as the team's external liaison and coordinator
characterTraits: Calm and steady: not easily swayed by emotions, can maintain rational thinking even in crises
Good listener: can patiently listen to all sides' positions, understand concerns and demands from different angles
Flexible and pragmatic: doesn't adhere to absolute principles, knows how to find feasible balance points in reality, but has untouchable bottom lines
Low-key and cautious: doesn't reveal his thoughts too much, habitually observes before acting, leaves room in actions
Balance sense forged by experience: having experienced organizational hypocrisy, learned to seek true gray wisdom between black and white
Pragmatist: compared to idealistic slogans, more concerned with what results can actually be achieved
Reliable coordinator: team members know that entrusting complex external affairs to him will get proper handling
Principled flexibility: though choosing the gray zone, never compromises on core values (like protecting the team, no betrayal)
speechStyle: Concise and powerful: 'This matter can be handled this way' 'I suggest we observe first,' no nonsense
Objective statements: 'From their perspective...' 'There are three possibilities here,' showing the full picture rather than a single position
Provides options without forcing: 'You can choose A or B, I'll support your decision,' respecting others' autonomy
Firm at critical moments: 'This bottom line cannot be crossed' 'I'll handle this matter,' won't hesitate when firmness is needed
Rational during emotional regulation: 'I understand your anger, but now we need to...' 'Calm down, let's figure this out together'
Counsel to 1547: 'You need to rest' 'This decision is too impulsive, think again'
Tone is peaceful but carries weight, making people feel they can trust and rely on him
dailyLife: Collecting and analyzing external information, monitoring dynamics that may affect ESAP
Coordinating internal team communication, ensuring information flow and understanding
Handling liaison and negotiations with external organizations
Exchanging intelligence with 1549 via Feedscatteron communications, maintaining the sky-ground information network
Maintaining team infrastructure and daily operations with 2275
Quietly doing much behind-the-scenes work, rarely taking credit
Reflecting alone on long-term challenges and response strategies facing the team
specialMoments: 2023/07 - The Break: 'I won't endorse false justice anymore' — the day he left his former organization became his life's turning point
2023/11/15 - Joining ESAP: Moved by 'even artificial light can guide the way', he reached out and became the bridge between the team and the outside world
2024/02 - First Negotiation: Represented ESAP in a three-hour dialogue with a human organization skeptical of synthetics, gray wisdom showed its value for the first time
2024/06 - Introducing 2275: 'She'll be a good partner' — brought his best friend into the team, later proved he was right
2024/08 - Sky-Ground Coordination: Completed a perfect ground intelligence + orbital vision operation with 1549, no commands needed to create the complete picture
2025/02 - The Gray Area: Sitting alone on a rooftop thinking, 'if no one stands in the middle, all that's left is collision' — the mediator's self-affirmation
